title: 8 million refugees have fled Ukraine after a year of fighting, UN data shows
description: More than 8 million refugees from Ukraine have been recorded across Europe as of Tuesday, nearly one year since Russia invaded, according to the U.N. refugee agency

title: WATCH:  Stella the dog learned to 'talk' and she will change the way you think about pets
description: Christina Hunger is a speech pathologist who realized her new puppy was showing signs of wanting to communicate with her. What she discovered is starting a new movement of ‘talking dogs.’

title: Flu vaccine worked well in season that faded fast, CDC says
description: Early estimates suggest the flu vaccine performed well in a U.S. winter flu season that has already dissipated

title: Biden to Muir on Putin suspending nuclear treaty: 'Big mistake,' not 'responsible'
description: President Joe Biden told ABC News anchor David Muir that it was a "big mistake" for Vladimir Putin to temporarily suspend Russia's participation in the New START treaty

title: 5th grader threatens shooting at Newport News elementary school
description: This latest incident at Richneck Elementary comes as the police investigation into what led to a 6-year-old student shooting his teacher.

title: Ivanka Trump, Jared Kushner subpoenaed by special counsel: Sources
description: Ivanka Trump, the daughter of former President Donald Trump, and her husband Jared Kushner have been subpoenaed by special counsel Jack Smith, ABC News has learned.

title: 5 killed in twin-engine plane crash in Little Rock
description: Five people were killed in twin-engine plane crash in Little Rock, Arkansas, on Wednesday, officials said.

title: WATCH:  Golden Retriever happily pulls kids on sled during snow day
description: Nala is the best doggy sister ever!

title: Man convicted of killing Nipsey Hussle sentenced to 60 years to life in prison
description: Eric Holder, Jr., the man who was convicted in the 2019 murder of hip-hop artist Nipsey Hussle, was sentenced to 60 years to life in prison.

title: Murder charges filed in slaying of beloved LA Catholic bishop
description: Murder charges have been filed against a 61-year-old man in the fatal Los Angeles shooting a long-serving Catholic priest known as a "peacemaker."

title: Justices OK overtime pay for $200,000-a-year oil rig worker
description: The Supreme Court has ruled that an energy company employee who earned more than $200,000 a year still qualified for overtime pay under a federal law meant to protect blue-collar workers

title: Small plane crashes outside factory in Little Rock, Arkansas
description: A small airplane has crashed outside a factory in the Arkansas capital, and there was no immediate word of any injuries

title: Ex-NFL player recovers after saving his kids from drowning
description: A former NFL running back says he’s on the road to recovery after he nearly died while saving his two children from drowning in the Gulf of Mexico in the Florida Panhandle

title: By speaking out, could foreperson in Georgia Trump probe undermine a future case?
description: The foreperson of the Georgia grand jury probing election interference by former President Trump has publicly telegraphed some of her panel's closely held findings.

title: Marine commission: Whale deaths not linked to wind prep work
description: An independent scientific agency that advises the federal government on policies that could impact marine mammals says there is no evidence linking site preparation work for offshore wind farms with a number of whale deaths along the U.S. East Coast

title: Space telescope uncovers massive galaxies near cosmic dawn
description: The galaxies found could date back to within 600 million years of the Big Bang.

title: New estimate US could face default on debt by early June
description: A new estimate finds the U.S. could face an unprecedented default on its obligations as soon as early June if Congress does not act to lift the debt limit

title: 100-year-old man killed in hit-and-run, police searching for suspect
description: Police in Oakland, California, say they're searching for the driver who struck and killed a 100-year-old man in a hit-and-run.

title: Could R. Kelly essentially get a 'life' prison sentence?
description: R. Kelly wouldn’t be eligible for release until 2066, a year shy of his 100th birthday, if a federal judge accepts prosecutors’ recommendations at his upcoming sentencing hearing

title: 'Deeply unsettled': What to know about Microsoft's controversial Bing AI chatbot
description: Microsoft's newly sophisticated Bing search engine has delivered results some find troubling.

title: Tokyo Olympic medalist weightlifter Son banned for doping
description: A weightlifter from Kazakhstan who won a bronze medal at the Tokyo Olympics in 2021 has been banned for eight years for doping

title: Grandmother charged with attempted murder after 7-year-old stabbed multiple times
description: A grandmother has been arrested and charged with attempted murder after allegedly stabbing her 7-year-old granddaughter multiple times with a kitchen knife.

title: CNN's Don Lemon tweets another apology, returns to work
description: CNN's Don Lemon returns to work on Wednesday after being off for three days following on-air remarks that Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley was not in ‘her prime

title: France: Teacher stabbed to death by high school student
description: French authorities and media reports say a teacher has been stabbed to death in southwestern France by a high school student

title: Palestinians: 5 killed in Israeli army raid in West Bank
description: Palestinian officials say that at least six Palestinians have been killed and more than two dozen were wounded during a daytime Israeli army arrest raid in the occupied West Bank

title: At least 2 dead, more than 50 missing in China mine collapse
description: Chinese state media are reporting at least two people have died and more than 50 are missing following a collapse at an open pit mine in the country's northern Inner Mongolia region

title: Ex-IS bride loses appeal to have her UK citizenship restored
description: A British woman whose U.K. citizenship was revoked after she traveled to Syria to join the so-called Islamic State group has lost an appeal in her fight to restore her citizenship

title: Russian lawmakers endorse suspension of nuclear pact with US
description: The lower house of tje Russian parliament has quickly endorsed President Vladimir Putin’s move to suspend the last remaining nuclear arms treaty with the United States

title: A year into Russia's invasion of Ukraine, how did we get here?
description: In the year since Russian President Vladimir Putin launched an invasion into Ukraine, thousand have been killed and international alliances have been strengthened.

title: N Korea calls UN chief's remarks on missile test 'unfair'
description: North Korea has accused U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres of “an extremely unfair and imbalanced attitude,” as it lambasted him for condemning its recent missile test but ignoring alleged U.S. hostility against the North

title: Nearly 1 million asylum requests in the EU in 2022
description: Nearly one million people applied for international protection in the European Union in 2022, the most since the refugee crisis of 2015-2016

title: Global impact: 5 ways war in Ukraine has changed the world
description: War has been a catastrophe for Ukraine and a crisis for the globe.

title: Avalanche kills 3 climbers after victims swept 500 feet down mountain
description: Three climbers have died in an avalanche after the lead climber accidentally triggered it while trying to reach the peak of an 8,705 foot mountain over the weekend.

title: Biden administration proposes new limit on how migrants can seek asylum in US
description: The Biden administration on Tuesday proposed a new immigration rule that, if implemented, would limit the ability for some people to seek asylum in the US

title: Alec Baldwin's attorney slams prosecution after gun enhancement charges dropped
description: Alec Baldwin's attorney's have slammed prosecutors after the gun enhancement charges were dropped against the actor.

title: Uvalde police chief wins appeal to upgrade termination record
description: Pete Arredondo, the Texas school district police chief terminated for his actions during the Uvalde shooting, won an appeal to remove a blemish from his discharge file.

title: 4th Fire Department employee probed in Tyre Nichols case
description: A top Memphis official says a fourth Fire Department employee is being investigated as part of the city’s probe into the violent arrest and death of Tyre Nichols

title: Musk's Tesla pay package under scrutiny in Delaware court
description: Attorneys for a Tesla shareholder are urging a Delaware judge to invalidate a 2018 compensation package awarded to CEO Elon Musk that is potentially worth more than $55 billion

title: Avalanche in Washington's Cascade Mountains kills 3
description: Heavy snowfall and winds are keeping searchers from reaching a remote peak in Washington's Cascade Mountains, where an avalanche killed three people

title: 2 dead, 3 injured in explosion at welding company in Florida: Officials
description: Two people have died and three others were injured following an explosion in Florida, authorities said on Tuesday.
